name: Halt
description:
Halt is a survival horror game that will take you into a world of terrible dreams, nightmares and monsters.

You will find yourself in the place of a detective who is investigating complicated cases about the disappearance of people during sleep. In the game you have to save ammo, hide and try to find a way out of this damned world.

Features: detective action, decisions with consequences, pixel art from HELLOWEIS.
